aircraft.value: Kestrel Patrol - AC-1332-442 at Zone-2 Facility

defect_observed.value: Flap extension asymmetry. Defect found during scheduled maintenance.

root_cause.value: Environmental exposure causing accelerated degradation of protective coatings

findings.value: Detailed investigation conducted on the defective Cargo Handling component. Testing confirmed performance below acceptable limits.

corrective_action.value: Repair damaged area using approved repair scheme

remarks_investigation.value: Investigation completed as per established procedures. All findings documented.

remarks_design.value: Design review completed. No design modification required. Component replacement as per maintenance manual is adequate. Date: 29/11/2024 Authorized Signatory of Design: Wg Cdr D.S. Nair

remarks_quality.value: Dept. Manufacturing quality documentation reviewed. No deviations noted. Concur with investigation findings. Date: 01/12/2024 Signature: Sqn Ldr V.K. Patel

remarks_user.value: (Project):(if applicable) User feedback incorporated. Recommend enhanced crew training on system operation and limitations. Date: 01/12/2024 Signature: Wg Cdr B.P. Gupta

remarks_ordaqa.value: (Quality Aspects) From quality standpoint, root cause analysis is thorough. Corrective measures are appropriate. Concur. Date: 05/12/2024 Signature: Eng. R.P. Singh

remarks_cemilac.value: / RCMA (Design Aspects) Certification review completed. Proposed modifications do not affect type design approval. Acceptable. Date: 04/12/2024 Signature: Air Cmde S.B. Rao
